title: Tangled Web
description: Cecile is excited about leaving for college in the fall, but after returning home from a walk she finds her home in shambles and her father covered with blood holding a knife. They argue and she leaves in the middle of the night. Three years later, her life is going well until a phone call from her mother makes her come face to face with a past she had been trying to forget. While looking for the truth of what happened, she finds love, lies, and a deadly secret.
author: Wendy Stanphill
